titleStmt.title: Gods arraignement of hypocrites with an inlargement concerning Gods decree in ordering sinne. As likewise a defence of Mr. Calvine against Bellarmine; and of Mr. Perkins against Arminius.
titleStmt.author: Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: With a final contents and errata leaf.
Dedication in two states: dedicatee's name is (1) "Alofe" or (2) "Aylofe".
